data.author: John Clute

changelog.release_notes: Increased text layer size for time and removed lines dividing the different watch sections.  It now looks like it is all on the same background.

Created a similar, watch face to informr, except move uptime to the top, and used another font that is easy to see.
Used a new background color, light gray, or white for aplite, and oxford blue or black (aplite) for text.

Found that I at times I wanted to know what day it was, so added day of week to the date line.

data.description:
Created an watch face that is easier to use with out the background light.
Top: Battery charge and Up time since last time charged.
Second line: Time
Third Line: Day and Date
Bottom Line: Bluetooth connected to phone.

latest_release.release_notes: Increased text layer size for time and removed lines dividing the different watch sections.  It now looks like it is all on the same background.

data.title: PTimeStats: ptstats
